parsed.internal_thinking: I have analyzed the current board state and identified Node 12 as the highest-yield available spot with 11 total pips. It sits at the intersection of Hex 6 (Wood 3), Hex 5 (Brick 6), and Hex 2 (Sheep 5). This provides a strong starting income of essential building materials (Brick and Wood) along with Sheep. Alice has secured a powerful Wheat and Ore position at Node 42 (12 pips), and Bob has taken a strong Wood, Brick, and Sheep position at Node 20 (12 pips). By taking Node 12, I match their high-yield strategy and also block Bob's potential expansion towards the high-value 6-Brick at Node 11. My long-term plan involves using my back-to-back placement to secure a balanced economy. For my second settlement, I'll target Node 44, which offers Wheat (Hex 15, #6 and Hex 18, #9) and Ore (Hex 19, #2), giving me access to all five resources with a total of 21 pips across both settlements. I'll point my initial road from Node 12 towards Node 13 to prepare for expansion towards the Wheat at Node 14.
parsed.note_to_self: I am placing my first settlement at Node 12 (W3, B6, S5). My second placement should be Node 44 (O2, Wh9, Wh6) to complete the resource set and maintain high pip counts. I should point my road from Node 12 towards Node 13 to expansion towards Node 14 (Wh8).
parsed.say_outloud: Hey Alice and Bob! Solid starts. Alice, that's some serious Wheat production. Bob, nice central positioning. I think I'll grab this spot at Node 12. It looks like a good place to start my network. Good luck to everyone!
